text:
The user wants me to analyze an SDMS project structure to understand how users and projects are managed and whether data automatically updates when new users/projects are added. They want a comprehensive analysis covering:

1. Directory structure exploration
2. User/project management files
3. Database schemas/models
4. Update mechanisms/triggers
5. API endpoints/services
6. Real-time update mechanisms

Let me start by exploring the directory structure to understand the project layout.
